name: crochet cauldron
notes:
brew up some crochet magic with this crochet cauldron pattern.

this is a quick and easy no-sew pattern. it would make a great halloween candy alternative, fun gift or market seller.

the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy.

the free written pattern can be found [here][1] on my blog.

**materials:**

* dk weight yarn
* 2.5mm crochet hook
* polyester fiberfill
* stitch marker, yarn needle, scissors

the finished item measure approximately 1.75‚Äù (4.5cm) tall. item size may vary depending on tension and materials used.


  [1]: https://www.stitchbyfay.com/no-sew-mini-crochet-cauldron-pattern
